data.comment: The big names in today's match at Carrow Road have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Carrow Road.
In the minute 27, Emiliano Buendia puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Kenny McLean.
Tim Robinson blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Carrow Road.
Curtis Nelson (Cardiff) has received a yellow card from Tim Robinson.
Cardiff's Sheyi Ojo has been booked in Norwich.
In the minute 66, Cardiff make their first substitution with Junior Hoilett replacing Marlon Pack.
It's now 2-0 in Norwich as Todd Cantwell scores for Norwich.
Emiliano Buendia instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 77, Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at Carrow Road with Mark Harris replacing Sheyi Ojo.
Marco Stiepermann is replacing Mario Vrancic for the home team.
Leandro Bacuna is booked for the away team.
In the minute 84, Kieran Dowell (Norwich) has replaced the possibly injured Emiliano Buendia at Carrow Road.
The match has come to a close in Norwich. The final score is 2-0.
It seems as if Max Aarons is unable to continue. Alexander Tettey replaces him for the home team.
Jordan Hugill is on a sub for Teemu Pukki for Norwich.
Harry Wilson (Cardiff) gets a yellow card.
